trans-unit.source: Describes the unit type associated with the width or height of a <xref href="System.Windows.FigureLength"></xref>.

Default value when the <xref href="System.Windows.FigureLength"></xref> is not specified which creates a value for the width or height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> that is calculated without constraints.
**Note:** When FigureUnitType is set to Auto, the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value*> property of <xref href="System.Windows.FigureLength"></xref> is set to `1`.

The value of the width or height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> is expressed as a fraction (including fractions greater then 1) of the width of the column the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> is in.

The value of the width or height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> is expressed as a fraction (including fractions greater then 1) of the content width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref>.

Note: **Note:** When FigureUnitType is set to Content, the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value*> property of <xref href="System.Windows.FigureLength"></xref> must be set to a value between `0` and `1`.

The value of the width or height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> is expressed as a fraction (including fractions greater then 1) of the page width of that the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> is in.

Note: **Note:** When FigureUnitType is set to Page, the <xref:System.Windows.FigureLength.Value*> property of <xref href="System.Windows.FigureLength"></xref> must be set to a value between `0` and `1`.
The value of the width or height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Figure"></xref> is expressed in pixels (96 pixels-per-inch).
